titlestmt.titleproper: Staggs and Company records, Inclusive: 1945, undated

note.p: Â© 2021 The Texas Collection. All rights reserved.

profiledesc.creation: Finding Aid was generated by The Texas Collection staff, using the STAR Knowledge Center for Archives (SKCA) task that automatically creates EAD files from the Archive's SKCA catalog records.

did.head: Records Summary
did.abstract: The Staggs and Company records consist of materials promoting the sale of their branding table.

bioghist.head: Biography/Profile
bioghist.p: Staggs and Company, Incorporated, was a ranching supplier based out of Henrietta, Texas. One of their most popular products was a branding table that created a more efficient process for branding, dehorning, or otherwise working with individual calves.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Staggs and Company records contain materials from 1945 with many undated items. The materials promote the sale of their branding table, a device that allowed ranchers to more efficiently brand and work cattle. The salesman listed on several of the materials is Don C. Martin.
Series I, Publicity Materials, includes a sales letter, pamphlets, an envelope, testimonials, and an order form.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection came to us in one folder. For the current round of processing, materials were grouped topically, with correspondence coming first, then pamphlets and other materials.
The collection is currently organized in one series, Publicity Materials.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: All requests for copying of materials must be submitted to The Texas Collection in writing. Please use the Request Form for Copying Materials sheet. Unpublished materials authored or otherwise produced by the creator (s) of this collection are in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

userestrict.head: Use/Re-use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Staggs and Company records, Accession #4008, Box #, Folder #, The Texas Collection, Baylor University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Described by Brijin Hartrick. Released on 2020-03-06.

bioghist.head: Biography/Profile
bioghist.p: The series contains correspondence, an order form, testimonials, and pamphlets. The series is in good condition.
